title: minecraft:entity_placer v1.20.50
description: The entity_placer item component specifies the blocks that the item can be placed on.

dispense_on.title: sequence container (class std::vector<struct Puv::v1_20_50::BlockDescriptor,class std::allocator<struct Puv::v1_20_50::BlockDescriptor> >)
dispense_on.description: List of block descriptors of the blocks that this item can be dispensed on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

entity.description: The entity to be placed in the world.

use_on.description: List of block descriptors of the blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.
